sys_ui_message.key: Defines which fields to show, hashmap object or json string with the format { field_name : { name:string, label:string, sys_readonly:bool, readonly:bool, visible:bool, type:'journal_input', maxLength:number }, ... }
sys_ui_message.message: Визначає поля відображення; об'єкт хеш-карти або рядок JSON у форматі { field_name : { name:string, label:string, sys_readonly:bool, readonly:bool, visible:bool, type:'journal_input', maxLength:number }, ... }
sys_ui_message.sys_name: Defines which fields to show, hashmap object or json string with the format { field_name : { name:string, label:string, sys_readonly:bool, readonly:bool, visible:bool, type:'journal_input', maxLength:number }, ... }
